languages.text: {mf|Его|Ее} взгляд был полон решимости — в тот момент все мое естество словно очнулось от дурного сна, в котором я завороженно и напряженно наблюдал за развернувшейся передо мной картиной.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Его|Ее} взгляд был полон решимости — в тот момент все мое естество словно очнулось от дурного сна, в котором я завороженно и напряженно наблюдал за развернувшейся передо мной картиной.

languages.text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.
languages.original_text: {mf|Его|Ее} взгляд был полон решимости — в тот момент все мое естество словно очнулось от дурного сна, в котором я завороженно и напряженно наблюдал за развернувшейся передо мной картиной.

traits.locale_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of my nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the unfurling scene.
{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of my nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the unfurling scene.

{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

languages.text: 陛下は、揺るぎない決意で私を見つめた。その自信が、私を悪夢のような昏迷から解き放ち、目の前で繰り広げられている光景を緊張して観察して見守っていた。
languages.original_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

traits.locale_text: 陛下は、揺るぎない決意で私を見つめた。その自信が、私を悪夢のような昏迷から解き放ち、目の前で繰り広げられている光景を緊張して観察して見守っていた。

languages.text: Sa Seigneurie me lança un regard plein de détermination. Ce fut cette confiance qui m'arracha à la stupeur cauchemardesque dans laquelle j'étais plongé et qui m'empêchait de quitter des yeux la scène se déroulant devant moi.
languages.original_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

traits.locale_text: Sa Seigneurie me lança un regard plein de détermination. Ce fut cette confiance qui m'arracha à la stupeur cauchemardesque dans laquelle j'étais plongé et qui m'empêchait de quitter des yeux la scène se déroulant devant moi.

languages.text: 舰长大人坚定不移地看着我。我一直在紧张地观察着眼前发生的一切，陷入了混乱的状态。正是大人的决心，才让我猛地清醒过来。
languages.original_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人坚定不移地看着我。我一直在紧张地观察着眼前发生的一切，陷入了混乱的状态。正是大人的决心，才让我猛地清醒过来。

languages.text: Mi{mf|lord|lady} me miró con una determinación inquebrantable, y fue esa confianza lo que me sacó del estupor de pesadilla que me hacía observar en tensión la escena que se desarrollaba ante mis ojos.
languages.original_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

traits.locale_text: Mi{mf|lord|lady} me miró con una determinación inquebrantable, y fue esa confianza lo que me sacó del estupor de pesadilla que me hacía observar en tensión la escena que se desarrollaba ante mis ojos.

languages.text: {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} sah mich mit standhafter Entschlossenheit an, und es war diese Überzeugung, die mich aus der albtraumhaften Lähmung riss, mit der ich das Geschehen beobachtet hatte.
languages.original_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} sah mich mit standhafter Entschlossenheit an, und es war diese Überzeugung, die mich aus der albtraumhaften Lähmung riss, mit der ich das Geschehen beobachtet hatte.

languages.text: {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri yılmaz bir iradeyle gözlerimin içine baktığında, olan biteni pürdikkat seyretmeme yol açan o korkunç sersemlikten bakışlarında gördüğüm öz güven sayesinde ayılabildim.
languages.original_text: {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} looked at me with unwavering resolve, and it was that confidence that wrenched me out of the nightmarish stupor that had me tensely observing the scene unfolding before me.
